title: a new game mode
body:
I thought it would be an awesome idea if we could play another game mode on the Twisted Treeline map,
since we cant use wards on this map, we should make a game mode where we can buy another item, so we can have 7 items.
This would solve the problem when you have to chose between two items for your last

replies.body:
I read a similar idea a little while ago... I don't know if this is allowed, but [Here's a link](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/Jn6PqUB5-game-mode-mega-bags).

The creator called it "Mega Bags" and suggested it for both SR and TT.

What if you get 7 Items and more Gold per second PLUS all the deleted items?
probs not

On Twisted Treeline, games finish a lot quicker then normal matches, so being able to buy more items would be sort of useless.
Perhaps you get more gold per second?
